overview.en: PVPChain is a global e-sports ecosystem. Based on blockchain technologies, PVPChain is now in the way of integrating e-sports resources all around the world, overturning the e-sports history and re-building a governance-shared events-centralized e-sports ecosystem.PVP protocol is a public chain in PVPChain ecosystem, providing rights guarantee and protection to the e-sport games, event organizers, executors, clubs, players and brands in the ecosystem, with high-level trustworthy, safety, concurrency, extensibility and reliability.
overview.zh: PVPChain 是一个基于区块链技术的全球电竞生态体系，能够整合全球电竞资源，颠覆历史，重新构建一个以赛事共治为核心的电竞生态体系。PVP 协议是 PVPChain 生态体系中的一条公链，它具有可行、安全、高并发、高扩展、高可靠性的特点，为生态体系中的电竞游戏、赛事方、执行方、俱乐部、选手、观众、品牌等提供权益保障。
